### Classes

* [`visualstudio::params`](#visualstudio--params): == Class visualstudio::params  This private class is meant to be called from `visualstudio` It sets variables according to platform

### Defined types

* [`visualstudio`](#visualstudio): Module to manage the installation of Microsoft Visual Studio
* [`visualstudio::package`](#visualstudio--package): Installs Virtualstudio. This private definition is meant to be called from `visualstudio`. It sets variables according to platform.

## Classes

### <a name="visualstudio--params"></a>`visualstudio::params`

== Class visualstudio::params

This private class is meant to be called from `visualstudio`
It sets variables according to platform

## Defined types

### <a name="visualstudio"></a>`visualstudio`

=== Examples:

 Install visual studio 2012:

   visualstudio { "visual studio 2012":
     ensure      => 'present',
     version     => '2012',
     edition     => 'professional',
     license_key => 'XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX',
     deployment_root => '\\server.mydomain.com\packages\VS2012'
   }

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `visualstudio` defined type:

* [`version`](#-visualstudio--version)
* [`edition`](#-visualstudio--edition)
* [`components`](#-visualstudio--components)
* [`license_key`](#-visualstudio--license_key)
* [`ensure`](#-visualstudio--ensure)
* [`deployment_root`](#-visualstudio--deployment_root)

##### <a name="-visualstudio--version"></a>`version`

Data type: `Pattern['^(2012)$']`

The version of visual studio to install

##### <a name="-visualstudio--edition"></a>`edition`

Data type: `Any`

The edition of visual studio

##### <a name="-visualstudio--components"></a>`components`

Data type: `Array`

The list of components to install as part of the visual studio suite

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-visualstudio--license_key"></a>`license_key`

Data type: `Pattern['([A-Z1-9]{5})-([A-Z1-9]{5})-([A-Z1-9]{5})-([A-Z1-9]{5})-([A-Z1-9]{5})$']`

The license key required to install

##### <a name="-visualstudio--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present','absent']`

Control the existence of visualstudio

Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-visualstudio--deployment_root"></a>`deployment_root`

Data type: `Any`

Network location where the visual studio packages are located

### <a name="visualstudio--package"></a>`visualstudio::package`

Installs Virtualstudio. This private definition is meant to be called from `visualstudio`. It sets variables according to platform.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `visualstudio::package` defined type:

* [`version`](#-visualstudio--package--version)
* [`edition`](#-visualstudio--package--edition)
* [`license_key`](#-visualstudio--package--license_key)
* [`deployment_root`](#-visualstudio--package--deployment_root)
* [`components`](#-visualstudio--package--components)
* [`ensure`](#-visualstudio--package--ensure)

##### <a name="-visualstudio--package--version"></a>`version`

Data type: `Pattern['^(2012)']`



##### <a name="-visualstudio--package--edition"></a>`edition`

Data type: `Any`



##### <a name="-visualstudio--package--license_key"></a>`license_key`

Data type: `Pattern['^([A-Z1-9]{5})-([A-Z1-9]{5})-([A-Z1-9]{5})-([A-Z1-9]{5})-([A-Z1-9]{5})$']`



##### <a name="-visualstudio--package--deployment_root"></a>`deployment_root`

Data type: `Any`



##### <a name="-visualstudio--package--components"></a>`components`

Data type: `Array`



Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-visualstudio--package--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present','absent']`



Default value: `'present'`
